start.on_start:
I woke up. There is a veery veery loong, huge, giant, humongous, incomprehensibly ginormous list of things I did.
But that's not important now.


-

nodes.title: the north end of the village

node_links.handle_goto: I started swimming toward the shore.
node_links.handle_gobackto: I started swimming toward the shore.

node_links.handle_goto: I entered the thick forest and followed the path.
